tool_description: Best players and teams within the competitive Valorant esports landscape
title: Valorant

api_list.name: Valorant Players
api_list.description: This API gets all valorant players
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant2.p.rapidapi.com/valorant_players"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
